original_solution_mapping.L1: The quilt is made of 16 squares on one side and 16 on the other so 16+16 = <<16+16=32>>32 squares total
original_solution_mapping.L2: She has already sewn 25% of the quilt so she has sown together .25*32 = <<25*.01*32=8>>8 squares
original_solution_mapping.L3: Betsy still has 32-8 = <<32-8=24>>24 more squares to sew together

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5139.
    Returns: the number of more squares Betsy needs to sew together.
    """
    # L1
    squares_one_side = 16 # 16 squares sewn together on one side
    squares_other_side = 16 # 16 squares sewn together on the other side
    total_squares = squares_one_side + squares_other_side

    # L2
    percent_sewn_decimal = 0.25 # 25% of the quilt
    percent_sewn_num = 25 # 25% of the quilt
    percent_factor = 0.01 # WK
    squares_sewn = percent_sewn_decimal * total_squares

    # L3
    remaining_squares = total_squares - squares_sewn

    # FA
    answer = remaining_squares
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: The quilt is made of {squares_one_side} squares on one side and {squares_other_side} on the other so {squares_one_side}+{squares_other_side} = <<{squares_one_side}+{squares_other_side}={total_squares}>>{total_squares} squares total

She has already sewn {percent_sewn_num}% of the quilt so she has sown together {percent_sewn_decimal}*{total_squares} = <<{percent_sewn_num}*{percent_factor}*{total_squares}={squares_sewn}>>{squares_sewn} squares
Betsy still has {total_squares}-{squares_sewn} = <<{total_squares}-{squares_sewn}={remaining_squares}>>{remaining_squares} more squares to sew together

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: The quilt is made of 16 squares on one side and 16 on the other so 16+16 = <<16+16=32>>32 squares total
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: She has already sewn 25% of the quilt so she has sown together 0.25*32 = <<25*0.01*32=8>>8 squares
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Betsy still has 25-8 = <<25-8=17>>17 more squares to sew together

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'percent_sewn_num' (value: 25) was used instead of 'total_squares' (value: 32).
